thread.title: Marriott International Releases New Episodes of an Original Podcast Series: The Wandernaut Show
thread.title_full: Marriott International Releases New Episodes of an Original Podcast Series: The Wandernaut Show

author: admin
title: Marriott International Releases New Episodes of an Original Podcast Series: The Wandernaut Show
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 1:20 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Marriott International 
BETHESDA, Md., Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Marriott International recently launched an original podcast series, The Wandernaut Show, providing listeners an opportunity to scratch beyond the surface of the world at work. The show features light-hearted, authentic conversations that tackle topics related to workplace dynamics - all in an accessible and entertaining format. In recent episodes, David Rodriguez , Marriott's Executive Vice President and Global Chief Human Resources Officer, mixes it up with show host, Alex Wandernaut, to dissect those over-used business buzzwords - and have a little fun. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279302LOGO 
Have you ever been sitting in a meeting when someone says, "Let's leverage that synergy to ideate on an innovative strategy that our matrixed team of high-potentials can execute against to deliver high impact, game-changing results." Ugh! Listen in as Dr. Rodriguez gets to the truth behind some of today's trending buzzwords in the workplace. 
"There are a lot of conversations happening about the evolving workplace," stated Rodriguez. "We decided to create a podcast series, something with a bit of an unexpected twist, to take the spirited dialogue we have about work and share it with the world in a snackable and entertaining way." 
The first six episodes of the original podcast series explored the disruptive forces unleashing accelerated generational change and the path to employee wellbeing and sustainable organizational effectiveness. In the latest episodes, Rodriguez talks with host Alex Wandernaut to decode business jargon such as high-potentials, innovation and the ubiquitous matrix organization. (Hint: Every organization is "matrixed" whether they recognize it or not.) Listen in to hear for example, why many organizations may have it wrong in their approach to attract and retain top talent. The Wandernaut Show will continue to evolve with more topics related to the world at work. Whether you work for Marriott, want to work for Marriott, or your travel brings you into the world of Marriott as a guest, we are all unified by this thing called work, so let's talk about it. 
Listeners can access The Wandernaut Show below or subscribe via SoundCloud and iTunes . You can also access the podcasts on YouTube by searching: wandernaut. 
About Marriott International, Inc . (NASDAQ: MAR) is a global leading lodging company based in Bethesda, Maryland, USA, with more than 4,300 properties in 81 countries and territories. Marriott International reported revenues of nearly $14 billion in fiscal year 2014. The company operates and franchises hotels and licenses vacation ownership resorts under 19 brands. A globally recognized best employer, Marriott is the highest-ranked hotel company on the 25 World's Best Multinational Workplaces list compiled by The Great Place to Work Institute and the only one to be named for five consecutive years. For more information or reservations, please visit our website at www.marriott.com , and for the latest company news, visit www.marriottnewscenter.com . 
Contact: Angela Wiggins at angela.wiggins@marriott.com 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/marriott-international-releases-new-episodes-of-an-original-podcast-series-the-wandernaut-show-300164078.html
